Description.Name: Beagle Active Probe
Description.Details: This electronic warfare component recreates the capabilities of the Star League era Beagle Active Probe. When activated, the probe performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius before entering a cooldown state. This component cannot be mounted along with the ECM component.

Description.Name: ACTIVE PROBE PING
Description.Details: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.
